longDesc: NoteBird is a project published as a web-app, an android app and a CLI on demand for developers. It fosters the salient features of Google Keep Notes and Microsoft One Note. Not only plain notes, but it also provides a ToDoList and List-of-titled-notes. We also have our own cloud where you can upload and store the related documents and images.

Cashalyzer is an offline cash-book that helps you keep a track of outgoing and incoming money in the form of cash. The amount has to be entered manually, and rest of the work is done by us :) We also provide a powerful search system that retrieves your expenses on the base of dates, items, sender, receiver and more!

It is a simple Tic Tac Toe game staged on Android 10+ . It has a built in bot to play against, that has ML implemented in it. Yes, it learns from your moves! Also, the game provides a 2 player mode. Soft animations and eye-pleasing theme do play a good role too.

Sophisticated realtime note taking app with a beautiful User interface maintaining a high performance by painting ur entire screen by our own system specially developed to work on low as well as high end resources. No-delay syncing over all platforms with your account logged in, is the primary strength of this app.
